# value

**Instance Property**

The parameter value of the point.

## Declaration

```swift
var value: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

Think of the value as the control point’s y-coordinate.



## Specifying Control Point Coordinates

- **relativeTime**: The time at which the associated parameter reaches this value, relative to the start time of the parameter curve.

items.description: The time at which the associated parameter reaches this value, relative to the start time of the parameter curve.
